## 4. hexo

```javascript
// yuque-hexo
npm install yuque-hexo --save
```

### 1)  package.json:

```javascript
"yuqueConfig": {
    "postPath": "source/_posts/yuque",
    "cachePath": "yuque.json",
    "mdNameFormat": "title",
    "adapter": "hexo",
    "concurrency": 5,
    "baseUrl": "https://www.yuque.com/api/v2",
    "login": "leader755",
    "repo": "blog",
    "token": " token",
    "onlyPublished": false,
    "onlyPublic": false
  },
```

|         |                                  |                |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------ | -------------------- |
| postPath      |                  | source/\_posts/yuque |
| cachePath     |                      | yuque.json           |
| mdNameFormat  |  (title / slug)        | title                |
| adapter       |  (hexo/markdown)         | hexo                 |
| concurrency   |                        | 5                    |
| baseUrl       |  API                         | -                    |
| login         |  login (group),    | -                    |
| repo          |  | -                    |
| onlyPublished |                  | false                |
| onlyPublic    |                        | false                |

> slug 

### 2) package.json  scripts

```javascript
//
{
  "sync": "yuque-hexo sync",
  "clean:yuque": "yuque-hexo clean"
}
```

 scripts 

```javascript
"scripts": {
    "build": "hexo generate",
    "clean": "hexo clean",
    "deploy": "hexo deploy",
    "server": "hexo server",
    "sync": "yuque-hexo sync",
    "clean:yuque": "yuque-hexo clean"
  },
```

Post.title: 6>hexo
Post._content: ## 1> ## 2> ### Hexo [hexo-prism-plugin](https://github.com/ele828/hexo-prism-plugin) Hexo ```javascript npm i -S hexo-prism-plugin ``` Hexo `_config.yml` `highlight.enable` `false` `prism` ```javascript highlight: enable: false prism_plugin: mode: 'preprocess' # realtime/preprocess theme: 'tomorrow' line_number: false # default false custom_css: ``` ### [hexo-generator-search](https://github.com/wzpan/hexo-generator-search) Hexo ```javascript npm install hexo-generator-search --save ``` Hexo `_config.yml` ```javascript search: path: search.xml; field: post; ``` ### ### halo [hexo-wordcount](https://github.com/willin/hexo-wordcount) ```javascript npm i --save hexo-wordcount ``` `_config.yml` ( postInfo post_wordcount) ```javascript post_wordcount: date: true # update: true # wordCount: true # totalCount: true # min2read: true # readCount: true # ``` ### [hexo-neat](https://github.com/rozbo/hexo-neat) gulp Bug - md markdown - ``` npm install hexo-neat --save ``` ``` neat_enable: true neat_html: enable: true exclude: neat_css: enable: true exclude: - '*.min.css' neat_js: enable: true mangle: true output: compress: exclude: - '*.min.js' ``` hexo cl&&hexo g Bug`halo` ``` #hexo-neat HTMLcssjsblank neat_enable: true neat_html: enable: true exclude: - '**/*.md' neat_css: enable: true exclude: - '**/*.min.css' neat_js: enable: true mangle: true output: compress: exclude: - '**/*.min.js' - '**/**/instantpage.js' - '**/matery.js' ``` ### ### hexo-external-link halo > [hexo-external-link](https://github.com/hvnobug/hexo-external-link) html a `target=_blank`, `rel=external nofollow noopener noreferrer`, , go.html; : ```javascript npm install hexo-external-link --save ``` Hexo \_config.yml ```javascript hexo_external_link: enable: true enable_base64_encode: true url_param_name: 'u' html_file_name: 'go.html' target_blank: true link_rel: 'external nofollow noopener noreferrer' domain: 'your_domain' # Post.title: serverless  hexo
Post._content:
## 1. hexo 

```javascript
// hexo-cli
npm install hexo-cli -g

// blog
hexo init blog

//(localhost:4000)
cd blog
hexo s
```

## 2.serverless 

github [https://github.com/serverless/serverless/blob/master/README_CN.md](https://github.com/serverless/serverless/blob/master/README_CN.md)
serverless [https://serverlesscloud.cn/](https://serverlesscloud.cn/)

## 3. npm 

```javascript
// serverless
npm install -g serverless
```

## 4. blog  serverless.yml 

 src  index.html 

```javascript
myWebsite:
  component: '@serverless/tencent-website'
  inputs:
    code:
      src: ./public
      index: index.html
      error: index.html
    region: ap-guangzhou
    bucketName: my-bucket
```

## 5. tencent-serverless

```javascript
// hexo 
heox g

// serverless
serverless/sls --debug
```

## 1. hexo 

```javascript
// hexo-cli
npm install hexo-cli -g

// blog
hexo init blog

//(localhost:4000)
cd blog
hexo s
```

## 2.serverless 

github [https://github.com/serverless/serverless/blob/master/README_CN.md](https://github.com/serverless/serverless/blob/master/README_CN.md)
serverless [https://serverlesscloud.cn/](https://serverlesscloud.cn/)

## 3. npm 

```javascript
// serverless
npm install -g serverless
```

## 4. blog  serverless.yml 

 src  index.html 

```javascript
myWebsite:
  component: '@serverless/tencent-website'
  inputs:
    code:
      src: ./public
      index: index.html
      error: index.html
    region: ap-guangzhou
    bucketName: my-bucket
```

## 5. tencent-serverless

```javascript
// hexo 
heox g

// serverless
serverless/sls --debug
```
